msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the top, right and bottom sides. The papyrus is divided in two pieces: the main part that contains col. 161 and the beginning of col. 162, which has a dark brown color, and a small vertical piece that contains the payments of col. 162 has a light brown color. Generally, the papyrus is damaged in the middle of col. 161, in the end of the lines, near the payments section, and at the beginning of col. 162. A big spot of ink is on the Verso. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive.
